title: Cleanspark invests $193 million in new miners, looks to 5x hashrate in anticipation of halving
description:
CleanSpark Inc., the third largest public Bitcoin mining company by hashrate, has agreed to purchase up to 160,000 Bitmain S21 miners, according to a Jan. 8 announcement. The move could propel its hashrate to an impressive 50 EH/s over the coming year, marking a substantial leap from its current 10 EH/s. Bitcoin hit a record […]

The post Cleanspark invests $193 million in new miners, looks to 5x hashrate in anticipation of halving appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin Soars Past $47K, Outstrips Meta in Market Cap Amid ETF Speculation and Intense Trading
description: Bitcoin breached the $47K threshold on Monday, fueled by growing excitement over the potential launch of a U.S. spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF). The leading crypto asset kicked off the day at $43,247 per unit, then climbed to a peak of $47,281 by 2:10 p.m. Eastern Time (ET). Bitcoin Rally Tops $47K Monday afternoon witnessed […]

title: Crypto gains momentum in Japan with Mercariâ€™s Bitcoin integration
description: In a significant move towards furthering the adoption of cryptocurrency, Mercari, one of Japan’s largest consumer-to-consumer e-commerce platforms, is set to allow users to purchase products listed on its flea market app using Bitcoin (BTC).  The integration of Bitcoin as a payment option is expected to commence in June and will be facilitated through Mercari’s […]

title: ChainLink Whales Show Confidence Amid Market Fluctuations
description: In the face of recent market volatility, Chainlink, a blockchain project with considerable long-term potential, is gaining attention for whale activities that suggest confidence in the project’s future. title: Standard Chartered makes bold predictions for market after Bitcoin ETF approval
description: Standard Chartered anticipates a substantial influx of $50 to $100 billion into Bitcoin after approving spot ETFs, with industry experts speculating a decision by this week.

title: Bitcoin reaches $47k as trading volume soares nearly 120%
description: Bitcoin has reached $47,000 for the first time in over 20 months, as several reports claim ETF approval will happen this week.
